test.create_query: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS codec_{seq_type}_{type}_{codec} (n {type} CODEC({codec})) ENGINE = MergeTree PARTITION BY tuple() ORDER BY tuple();
test.query: INSERT INTO codec_seq_{type}_{codec} (n) SELECT number/pi() FROM system.numbers LIMIT {num_rows} SETTINGS max_threads=1
INSERT INTO codec_mon_{type}_{codec} (n) SELECT number+sin(number) FROM system.numbers LIMIT {num_rows} SETTINGS max_threads=1
INSERT INTO codec_rnd_{type}_{codec} (n) SELECT (intHash64(number) - 4294967295)/pi() FROM system.numbers LIMIT {num_rows} SETTINGS max_threads=1
